Multiple Facebook posts and videos claim: indicating widespread circulation of the claim.
A YouTube video with over 39: 000 views claimed that the EU Parliament had approved all of Nnamdi Kanu's demands and assured him of full support for the actualization of Biafra nation.
Kanu: s tweet showing a picture of himself meeting British MEP Seb Dance at the European Parliament on September 10, 2019, suggests that he had indeed visited Brussels.
Seb Dance: s office confirmed that he had met with IPOB members at the EU Parliament on September 10, but clarified that his stance on the Biafra issue was neutral, contradicting social media posts claiming EU support for the Biafran cause.
